sourcesContent: import React, { Component } from 'react' import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container' import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row' import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col' import './Visa.css' import Logo from '../../../img/CompanyLogos/VisaLogo.png' import Chip from '../../../img/credit-card-chip.svg' const Visa = (props) => { return ( {props.number.slice(0, 4)} {props.number.slice(4, 8)} {props.number.slice(8, 12)} {props.number.slice(12, 16)} {props.owner ? props.owner.toUpperCase() : "FULL NAME"} {props.expirationMonth ? props.expirationMonth : "••"} / { props.expirationYear ? props.expirationYear : "••" } ) } export default Visa
